definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_jumps</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="149" pinned="false" w="667">Just like hunger, thirst has a a number from 0-4 that calculates when to deduct a point of hydration. Doing nothing, this number is added by 0.001 per tick [0.02 per second] or 1 hunger is reduced per 200 seconds. Jumping expends an extra 0.05 per tick (2 per second) or  1 hunger is reduced per 4 seconds. </comment><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:Thirstlevel</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">SURVIVAL</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_logic_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesboolean">CUSTOM:Hydration</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">PEACEFUL</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:ThirstExhaustionLevel</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
